entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
